text:
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
555 Madison Avenue
New York, N. Y. 10022
(212) 582-2020
July 1, 1969
Mr. William J. Harley
President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue,. N.W.
Washington D.C. 20036
Dear Mr. Harley:
I am pleased to enclose a check in the anount of $22,610.00
for financial assistance to enable you to relocate the
facilities for the National Educational Radio Network in
Washington D.C. This grant is made in response to the
letter dated April 22, 1969 from John W. Macy to yourself.
Very truly yours,
l Bwj
Richard JV Clavell
Business Manager
RJC:ro
Enel.
